description.description_string: Set to true if HRC provides flow request point via network interface
Heating COP at design heating conditions
Minimum cooling capacity below which cycling occurs
Minimum heating capacity below which cycling occurs
Default specific heat capacity used to compute required capacity
Default fluid density used to compute required capacity
Duration used to compute the moving average of required capacity
Minimum runtime of enable and disable states
Runtime with sufficient load before enabling
Runtime with first temperature threshold exceeded before disabling
Runtime with second temperature threshold exceeded before disabling
CHW return temperature upstream of HRC
CHW volume flow rate distributed to the loads
HW return temperature upstream of HRC
HW volume flow rate distributed to the loads
Mode command: true for cooling, false for heating

expression.simple_expression:
"

The control sequence consists of the following parts.

  • Heat recovery chiller enable logic: Refer to Buildings.Templates.Plants.Controls.HeatRecoveryChillers.Enable.
  • Heat recovery chiller CHW and HW pump control: The logic assumes constant speed pumps. The pumps are enabled as described in Buildings.Templates.Plants.Controls.HeatRecoveryChillers.Enable and disabled as described in Buildings.Templates.Plants.Controls.Pumps.Primary.DisableDedicated.
  • Heat recovery chiller mode control and setpoint selection: Refer to Buildings.Templates.Plants.Controls.HeatRecoveryChillers.ModeControl.
"

"
  • May 31, 2024, by Antoine Gautier:
    First implementation.
"
